argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | #P_elssuni | |- ( A e. J -> A C_ U. J ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_syl6sseqr | |- ( A e. J -> A C_ X ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> A C_ X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-ss | |- ( A C_ X <-> ( A i^i X ) = A ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( A i^i X ) = A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_difeq1d | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( ( A i^i X ) \ B ) = ( A \ B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_indif2 | |- ( A i^i ( X \ B ) ) = ( ( A i^i X ) \ B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cldrcl | |- ( B e. ( Clsd ` J ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> A e. J ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_cldopn | |- ( B e. ( Clsd ` J ) -> ( X \ B ) e. J ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( X \ B ) e. J ) |
| 14 |  | #P_inopn | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. J /\ ( X \ B ) e. J ) -> ( A i^i ( X \ B ) ) e. J ) |
| 15 | 10, 11, 13, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( A i^i ( X \ B ) ) e. J ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( ( A i^i X ) \ B ) e. J ) |
| 17 | 7, 16 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( A \ B ) e. J ) |
